Room.Name: Quifael's monster pen
Room.Description: You are in a big, subterranean room with heavy massive stone walls and no windows whatsoever. A virtual ladder leads upwards.

Exit.Description: The ladder leads to the laboratory.

Room.Name: Quifael's study
Room.Description: You are in a small, comfortable study room. The walls are lined with bookcases filled with dusty volumes of all sizes. In the fireplace burns a crackling fire that makes the room warm and cosy, and in front of an oakwood reading desk is a large old-fashioned chair.

Exit.Description: The corridor leads south to the hall.

ExtraDescription.Keyword: bookcase bookcases volume volumes book books
ExtraDescription.Description: Most of the books are heavy, leatherbound and covered in a thin layer of dust. There are many titles on necromancy, conjuring and other spheres of Magick, but also some on computer science (although these seem to be VERY dusty indeed) and a fair collection of horror literature, ranging from Bram Stoker and H. P. Lovecraft to Anne Rice and Stephen King.
The fireplace isn't particularly big, but the fire crackles merrily in it.
It is very massive and but seems worn from many years of use.
It is big and old-fashioned, but quite comfortable nevertheless.

Room.Name: Quifael's laboratory
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with shelves containing all sorts of weird equipment. The walls are lined with numerous shelves and a massive working desk is by the north wall. The air smells of rare chemicals and spices. A virtual ladder leads downwards. A magical portal is hovering in the air just in front of the east wall.

Exit.Description: To the east is the magical portal.
To the west is the hall.
The virtual ladder leads down to the monster pen.

ExtraDescription.Description: The shelves contain a mass of bottles, jars and boxes of different shapes and sizes, of which some contain powders and liquids in various colours. Others contain dragon's claws, giant's eyes, rabbit's ears and other body parts of different monsters.
On the desk is a peculiar apparatus of glass bottles and globes connected by small pipelines. The green liquid inside the apparatus' globes and pipelines is bubbling steadily.

Room.Name: Quifael's virtual balcony
Room.Description: You are on a transparent balcony hanging in mid-air. You notice a faint blue glow surrounding everything, even yourself, making it seem as transparent as the balcony itself. From here, you have a terrific view of the whole Forest of Haon-Dor. A transparent bronze plate has been bolted to the balcony railing. A magical portal is hovering in the air to the west.

Exit.Description: The magical portal is to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: Quite transparent, but visible anyway, because of the blue glow that surrounds the whole place.

The transparent bronze plate looks quite strange, but the engraved letters are quite easy to read, nevertheless :- Quifael's Virtual Balcony Do not lean out! Please do not try to attract the attention of any adventurers in the forest, as you are not really in existence at the moment. (This could possibly mess up Reality, and we wouldn't want to do that, would we?)
Through the tree crowns, you see fellow adventurers walking around in the forest, gathering mushrooms, eating blackberries, committing rabbit genocide and generally having a good time.

Room.Name: Quifael's hall
Room.Description: You are in sparsely decorated and quite dusty hall. Old wooden doors lead north, east and south and to the west is the front door. An old mirror hangs on the wall.

Exit.Description: The study is to the north.
The laboratory is to the east.
The kitchen is to the south.
The front door leads to Park Road.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see yourself looking back at you.

Room.Name: Quifael's kitchen
Room.Description: You are in an old-fashioned kitchen.

Exit.Description: The hall is to the north.
